cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.authentication.service.impl

Class SAMLValidationServiceOpenSAML

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.authentication.service.impl.SAMLValidationServiceOpenSAML
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SAMLValidationService

    public class SAMLValidationServiceOpenSAML
extends Object
implements SAMLValidationService
    Uses the OpenSAML library to validate the supplied assertion. It is an Spring Security (SS) unrelated implementation. It helps hiding from SS all the certificates configuration, namely:
    • Requires a keystore to hold the private key to decrypt encrypted assertions, should the given assertion be encrypted.
    • Requires identity provider (IdP) metadata in order to obtain the IdP signing certificate which is the trust anchor for validating the signature of the assertion.
    Author:
    cscanigo

    • Field Detail

      • idpCredentials

        protected cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.validation.credentials.SAMLIdPMetadataCredentials idpCredentials
        The identity provider metadata is loaded in order to obtain its public signing certificate so that assertion sigantures can be validated. A file metadata resolver will be chosen provided GICAR's Shibboleth won't be rolling certificates that often, but it is required to be a periodically refreshed resolver. Configure the file containing the metadata with idpMetadaFile and choose the entity in the file with idpEntityId.

      • spBridgeCredentials

        protected cat.gencat.ctti.canigo.arch.security.saml.validation.credentials.SAMLKeystoreEncryptionCredentials spBridgeCredentials
        Encryption credentials used for decrypting encrypted assertions. If null, received assertions must be plain text Assertion tags. If loaded with some value, received assertions will be contained in an EncryptedAssertion tag. Configure the keystore and the alias containing the private key of this credential with spBridgeKeystorePath, spBridgeKeystorePass, spBridgeEncryptionKeyAlias, spBridgeEncryptionKeyPass.
